forecast.day_comments: Snow. The snow could be heavy at times.  High near 27. Calm wind.  Chance of precipitation is 90%. Total daytime snow accumulation of 7 to 11 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: Snow, mainly before 9pm. The snow could be heavy at times.  Low around 18. Calm wind becoming northwest around 6 mph after midnight.  Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.
